Html:
Hi!

How can I make my solution multi-threaded?

I used theese parameters:
State.ThreadOption = (ushort)ThreadOptions.MarkerTracking;
State.ThreadOption = (ushort)ThreadOptions.PhysicsSimulation;

but I think the multi-threading doesn't work. I got a 4 cored CPU and if i run my solution the performance monitor show that the application only uses 1 core.

The tracking and the physics are runs on that core/thread where main function run.

How can I solve this?
